title: Is Trump already becoming a lame-duck president?
shortDescription: With Congress passing just 61 laws last year, Trump’s influence may already be slipping heading into his second year in office.

title: 'We're in charge.' Trump doubles down on US position in Venezuela
shortDescription: President Donald Trump doubled down on his claim that the US is 'in charge' of Venezuela as questions swirl on the path forward after Maduro's arrest.

title: Lawmakers ready vote to avoid another government shutdown
shortDescription: Top lawmakers in Congress released three bipartisan spending bills to avoid another shutdown after Jan. 30.

title: Trump says Cuba is 'ready to fall,' threatens Colombian president
shortDescription: President Trump said Cuba is "ready to fall" and threatened U.S. military intervention in Colombia following the U.S. attack in Venezuela.

title: Gov. Tim Walz drops reelection bid amid fraud scandal
shortDescription: Walz, who was the Democratic nominee for vice president on Kamala Harris' 2024 campaign, has come under fire for his handling of allegations of large-scale fraud in Minnesota's social service programs.

title: ‘We’re in charge:’ Trump on Venezuela after Maduro raid
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said that the United States will be “in charge” of Venezuela after U.S. special forces captured its president Nicolas Maduro.

title: Are Trump's signature tariffs even legal? | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Rising health care costs, limits on executive power and two ongoing conflicts are all substantive issues Trump faces in the new year as midterms near.

title: Trump hints at more military action
shortDescription: After capturing the Venezuelan president, Trump hinted that other countries in the region could be next to see military action.

title: Trump calls Greenland vital for US security
shortDescription: President Donald Trump calls Greenland vital for US security as officials and Nordic allies push back.

title: Are Trump's signature tariffs even legal?
shortDescription: Rising health care costs, limits on executive power and two ongoing conflicts are all substantive issues Trump faces in the new year as midterms near.

title: Denmark's leader responds after Trump says 'we do need Greenland'
shortDescription: The White House's moves in Venezuela have elevated again concerns in Copenhagen that the same could happen with Greenland, a Danish territory.

title: Is Greenland next? Trump renews takeover calls after Venezuela strike
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has repeatedly talked about annexing Greenland. He reupped those calls hours after the U.S. captured Venezuela's leader.

title: ¿Trump pone en la mira a México y Colombia? Presión tras Venezuela
shortDescription: Trump eleva la presión regional tras Venezuela y lanza mensajes a México, Colombia y Cuba, reavivando tensiones sobre narcotráfico y soberanía.
